PluginAnalyser JavaDoc

This API sepcification is for the PluginAnalyser system,

PluginAnalyser allows you to setup, mirror, analyse and record and compare to figure out missing and unstated dependencies from information of, feature(s), plugin(s) or a set of those, as well as complete installations and update sites.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.analysis has all the bundle and feature analysis related functions.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.comparison all comparison for satisfied and missing dependencies.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.job job runner related functionality for the PluginAnalyser system.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.staging mirroring an update site with all the artifacts and metadata.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.utils the utility functions useful in the project.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.utils.http  
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.utils.logging has all the Logging (info and error) related functions.
com.shivanshusingh.pluginanalyser.utils.parsing  
examples examples of how to use the PluginAnalyser system.

 

This API sepcification is for the PluginAnalyser system,

PluginAnalyser allows you to setup, mirror, analyse and record and compare to figure out missing and unstated dependencies from information of, feature(s), plugin(s) or a set of those, as well as complete installations and update sites.

Some background:

Analysing Dependencies and Providing Assurance in the world of Plug In based systems (Eclipse Ecosystem)
